attributes.action: Give John Volanthen a knighthood following his discovery Thai boys in the cave
attributes.background: John Volanthen provided a vital role in the liberation of the Thai children. A role which he volunteered for and sought no appraisal nor adulation. John Volanthen embodies the noble British qualities of selflessness and heroism.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
